lead_paragraph: GOLDSTEIN--Linda N.,on June 28, 2016. Beloved wife of Neil. Devoted mother of Sara Mairs. Loving sister of Gloria Lehrman and Sylvia glazer. Services Friday, July 1st, 12:30pm at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. Contributions may be made to Congregation Habonim or The American Cancer Society. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDSTEIN, LINDA N.
